positive.review: I Shot up a crowd of people blew up a king and commaneded a bunch of red people to attack blue people then played TABS great game honestly

Belive me, ive played this game for 217 hours. longer then any other game I have and Totally Accurate Battle simulator is amazing. There are almost no bugs (unless if you count units getting glitched into the ground from sheer force) It runs great on all devices. And the units and maps that come with this game are amazing but I recommend downloading some units or factions or maps from the workshop. Also the unit creator is one of the best parts. Then theres also the fact that this game does not suffer from player burnout. Overall, totally accurate battle simulator is an amazing game 100000/10  and is a must buy even at its price of 20$
simulator for war and also a challenging game. multiplayer,mods and a l o t  m o r e.
gets boring after you complete all the missions and gets too easy with the dlc but i did not regret buying this
The only game where you can hardly tell the difference between living ragdolls and dead ragdolls
just a very fun sandbox war simulator game, but with workshop everything become wild and fun
an amazing game, i had amazing fun making an entire army of skeletons with complex tactics that often destroyed base game units
so fun a great game and super funny too

What is there to say for this game? It's a totally accurate battle grounds game for totally accurate games to play in a totally accurate way! (Seriously it's a really cool game, perhaps cooler then you think...)

Amazing game, I used to watch people place this all the time and it looked incredible. Out of the countless hours that I have spent playing this masterpiece, I can not honestly say the last time it has bored me. Whatever they were feeding these guys when they made this game has to be labeled as radioactive without a doubt. Some of the comedic characters within the game blow my mind for the reason alone that I would not have been able to comprehend such things without.
very fun sandbox game you can do basically anything in it
Fun funny fun fun game funny short fat people push big king sword of cliff it funny and horsey run into walls  trying to get axe boy funny fun funny great fun funny yes game.

This game is pretty fun as you can play the campaign or go into a sandbox and make the whole map full of characters. I really enjoyed the fact you can creat your own characters, maps, and battles. This game was really fun when I first got it but after a while, once you play the campaign for a bit and play in a sandbox, it does get a bit boring and repetitive. I got a new PC and the game wiped all my data, other than the stuff I posted on the worshop, so that wasn't fun. But overall the game is fun and I do recomend it.

7.5/10

it is a very fun campaign and good custom content

THIS IS AN AWESOME GAME!  I have played this game for over 200 hours, and it is so fun. There are some simulations that made my whole family laugh, and secret characters that you can find in all maps. Please play this!

nice game that allows you to create battles and has a really nice campaign mode. runs well on most devices (except my m1 macbook air) and the sandbox mode is fun and allows you to absolutely nuke your computer with hwacha, overall really fun

This game was pretty good, I found the levels fun yet challanging although some did seem a little unfair and took some elbow grease to get it done. Overall the design and gameplay was fun and the soundtrack was really good
A lot of love went into this fun and janky sandbox. If you want a low demand sandbox RTS then this is your best option. Extremely re-loadable and a great time with friends or alone.

To die laughing, the options "drunk" and "waving a weapon in different directions" should be added to the game.

Great Game I would definitely recommend this game. It's just stupid fun okay, the derpy noises, physics and creativity are amazing. I do wish they'd fix some bugs and add more updates because they stopped the updates when there's still so much more to do, but great overall. 7/10

Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is fun, it has funny ragdoll-like characters, and you can even create your own! Personally, I think this game is a game to enjoy.
Best to play when not feeling creatively bankrupt, but still great
Quite good to waste a couple of hours on, if you like a ragdoll godmode sim with a little bit of jank in the middle, this game is for you.

a fun, goofy game where you make little ragdoll dudes fight ranging across different eras. you can even make your own units! this is 100% a must buy! ive bought this on multiple platforms such as xbox, nintendo switch, and pc. definetly the best version is pc, though. this is one of my fav games to play when im bored

I remember watching Markiplier play the first versions of this game and to see it now is crazy with how much different and more detailed it is now, this is an enjoyably absurd strategy game that's very fun to play through, set up you're own battle or create your own omnipotent unit and play as them lol. For $20 i'd say it's almost worth the price.

7.4/10 Good game to get on a sale and has some fun to offer.

The unit creator allows so much diversity, not to mention, the difficulty is perfect, and you can even download other people's battle scenarios, campaigns, and even units! And if you like doofy-ness, this game is so perfect. WORTH. EVERY. PENNY

well its definitely accurate. i gotta say this is one of my favorite games oat, it has really good graphics good gameplay blah blah, but the rng is what makes it best, your units can be small as your toe or as big as your favorite modded game. Definitely recommend if your having a tough time and want to have some laughs.
It is a lot  of fun and u get to look for some other characters to unlock them.
epic game so dirpy and fun lol i killed a dark peasant then made a giant banana!

Text Review:

Pros:
 -Great, diorama visuals (Colourful and cartoony). It's lush but can
lack refinement at less viewed areas (Might be fair even if you're
expected to look for secrets). So detailed you can see a musket
ball! Some cosmetic items clip through one another
 -Nice music that fits with the different faction themes (Strangely
serious in tone though) and the unit noises are funny!
 -Brilliant and extensive customization tools, if it's difficult to create
vehicle riders and balancing the units!
 -Great physics and combat simulation gameplay (Quite funny).
Sometimes it's light and breezy and other times it actually
requires tactical thought in a strange way
 -Good hidden object gameplay to find secrets and unlock units and even
campaigns (A proper reward!)

Maybes:
 -No story or tutorials so I had to look up how to unlock secrets and as
mentioned some guidance regarding customization would be nice!
 -Physics based humour is kind of the point! The game is  kind of
inherently indirect (Even when you possess units because they are so
slow, wobbly and attacks are hard to connect)
	
	Cons:
 -Unrefined as it will just let you place more units than is wise for
processing and the camera resets so you can't start with the view
you prefer and have to pause for that immediately especially
if you want to posess units

Cheapness Checklist

 -Took me 15 (Quite a lot of levels left plus I subtracted 9 hours of
customization)

 -Price During			Full Price		Sale Price		Price per Hour
Steam Summer		  	 R199.00	          R67.66	             R4.52
Sale 2025				  $19.99		   $6.80		     $0.46
				          Â£15.99		   Â£5.44	             Â£0.43

 -Fairly big download size as it only takes up 4.49 Gb on the hard drive

-Not easy to run... the Warhorse test did not go well!

-Splitscreen multiplayer for 2 players (Weird and finicky - 
not controller flexible)

 -Kid friendly (At worst some voices may be offensive but that's
harsh!)

good game and ragdoll and like enough maps and you can make your own campain units and maps and even share them
it is a great game because you have to find some of them and you have a lot and I like when one of the things are in my lesson at school
i would recommend this to others because it is a funny and enjoyable game but after a little of non stop playing it gets boring so in my opinion i think this game is a little mid still fun though
the campaigns are really fun and theres a lot of volatility in the game that makes it fun

good game.
almost infinitely and easily moddable, and can have some funny, unique moments. in other battle sims, the results will almost always be the same between two armies, but in TABS, the balance of success and loss could hang on a halfling tripping over or not. overall, a 9/10 game.
its absolutely golden with basically no flaws. even if you lose its still very much enjoyable and there's plenty of secrets and places to find and explore. over all 100/10 worth the price
best goofy fun fighting sandbox and campaign ever

This game is good and all, But please bring back these characters from the beta:

it is very fun to experiment with diffrent battles and use the slo mo feature
game is fucking awesome if you got some time to kill. i love making my own units especially with mods, would recommend 10/10 sandbox dude.

amazing game. Its simple, funny, kind of complex depending on what level your on. It will take you a while to get bored of it and the controls are simple so it isn't hard at all. You can also create your own characters which is very fun! you can create a short guy with a mini-gun or a giant with a small sword and make them fight! it wont take you while to progress which is very good. Although, for some reason when there are more than 50 characters on each side it can blur out a lot and sometimes will freeze for a second or two which is something which may just be my laptop as its not the best. anyway one of the best games I have bought on steam so far.
You see my hours, I'm not explaining shit.It's basically when you were a kid playing with toys and making battles.
its pretty good, definitely fun for for like few hours, totally not for like a hundred hour something, who would do that

I had picked this up due to the youtuber Doug Doug making this look fun. Happy to report it is fun playing it, it is perfect for when you are too tired for a fast pace game but you still want death and destruction.

The game at first seems like any other battle sim.
Wrong.
Its a game about more then that.
its a game where diffrent factions fight for order and peace, in a land of blue and red.
so next time you play, give some thougt
mid asf, barely any updates but decent gameplay, would reccomend but heed my warning that there hasnt been an update in a year and a half.

Totally Accurate Battle Simulator never takes itself too seriously, and that's a good thing - behind the wacky characters and wobbly physics lies a genuinely expansive, engaging and challenging battle simulator that will keep you invested for a multitude of wars.
